data.what_is: Resulticks is a fully integrated, real-time customer engagement platform designed to help brands worldwide reach, acquire, and retain satisfied customers. Built from the ground up by experts in marketing, technology, and business management, Resulticks enables brands to make a transformational leap to conversion-driven, growth-focused personalized engagement. With an advanced CDP at its core, Resulticks offers Ai-powered omnichannel orchestration, complete analytics, next-best engagement, attribution at the segment-of-one level, and the world's first marketing block chain.
data.product_description: Resulticks is marketing automation redefined and realized. Everything you need to create, manage, track, and report on campaigns across multiple channels in a single cloud-based platform.Resulticks is an integrated omni channel marketing automation tool that takes care of customer acquisition, engagement, and conversion across online and offline channels - email, mobile (in app, sms), web, social, QR. It is one platform that can trace the customer journey throughout a communication lifecycle and clearly show the contribution of a customer to conversion and top line revenue.It caters to both B2C and B2B

It is one platform that can trace the customer journey throughout a communication lifecycle and clearly show the contribution of a customer to conversion and top line revenue.It caters to both B2C and B2BSeller DetailsSellerResulticksYear Founded2012HQ LocationSan Francisco, CATwitter@Resulticks2,234 Twitter followersLinkedIn(r) Pagewww.linkedin.com304 employees on LinkedIn(r)RSOverview Provided by:Redickaa SubramanianCEO & Chief Strategist

initial_reviews.review_title: Fully integrated digital marketing  platform that allows streamlined campaigns for the best results
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Resulticks?
Resulticks is a platform that fully takes into consideration the needs of its customers and presents specially-curated solutions to the most complex marketing problems.

With an entire digital marketing ecosystem available in one platform, we were able to create targeted campaigns and through readily available data, we were able to determine which channels were most effective as well as customise messaging and brand positioning according to the specific channels and customer segments.

With the recommendations provided by Resulticks, we were able to ensure that our strategies were viable from the start and would achieve the best results.

What do you dislike about Resulticks?
Because of how nuanced and refined the platform is, familiarising oneself with its wide range of functions could get tough. However, with the support provided by the Resulticks team as well as their openness to feedback, the platform becomes accessible and becomes the best and most reliable tool your team will need.

Recommendations to others considering Resulticks:
For an Integrated Communications Agency that manages multiple brands' campaigns with many moving parts, we highly recommend Resulticks for a more efficient method of developing, creating and monitoring campaigns for your clients. Everything you require is in a user-friendly interface.

With easily obtainable data directly from the platform, we have been able to deliver and present astounding results to our clients in a more relatable and engaging manner. This has ultimately resulted in their unwavering trust in our agency.

Resulticks has allowed us to free up a significant amount of time and resources which we would otherwise be using in very tedious and dull processes.

What problems is Resulticks solving and how is that benefiting you?
With very tight deadlines to execute campaigns and achieve commendable results for our clients, we need to ensure that our campaigns are as targeted and effective as possible. With Resulticks we can narrow each target segment down to the relevant attributes and develop strategies and messaging accordingly.

Resulticks also provides us with real-time updates on whether our campaigns have the intended effects on our target audience, this allows us to make the necessary changes almost immediately.

Moreover, as we work with a diverse range of industries, we love that Resulticks can synthesise everything we need to cater to these industries and different business models in one place.

initial_reviews.review_title: Marketing Automation Platform To Increase Conversions, and Measure Results
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Resulticks?
Resulticks is an affordable digital marketing automation platform that helps to increase revenue through real-time conversations and social media marketing. Easily integrated with Facebook, Linked In, Twitter, Instagram, and Pinterest Social media tools to track real time business, Resulticks makes it easier for companies to engage their customers online. Spend less time doing monotonous digital marketing chores and start getting more done. Social media marketing platform helps brands automate social media, save time, increase conversions, and measure results.

What do you dislike about Resulticks?
It is best to create a robust digital marketing strategy. Resulticks is a real-time engagement, a marketing automation platform that lets you connect with our customers in real-time by converging all of our marketing channels into one intelligent digital hub.

Recommendations to others considering Resulticks:
We recommend Resulticks for multiple online businesses to increase sales. It offers a marketing calendar where we can plan our social media posts, link your Google Analytics data to better plan our content strategy and campaign management, and track how many people are engaging with our content on platforms.

What problems is Resulticks solving and how is that benefiting you?
Resulticks Marketing Automation is a secure cloud based marketing automation platform. It gives advanced functionality to send, measure, and track marketing emails in real-time. We use it for our consulting business and track real time users. Resulticks integrates with most major social media platforms to help automate our social media marketing efforts. It includes a powerful digital marketing calendar that allows us to connect multiple tools in one place, giving ultimate control over our business's digital presence. By executing personalized marketing strategies across all our social media channels, Resulticks helps to generate more business leads and convert them into customers. Integrate your brand with the real-time conversation cloud and create a marketing calendar to understand how to execute a business growth plan.

review_question_answers.answer: Resulticks is an affordable digital marketing automation platform that helps to increase revenue through real-time conversations and social media marketing. initial_reviews.review_title: Robust solution for true omnichannel marketing
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Resulticks?
Resulticks is an incredibly intuitive solution that requires very little support from their team. My team was able to set up campaigns or analyze results very quickly and effortlessly. The multidimensional campaign canvas is very convenient and includes all the conventional B2B channels that we need. The ability to track unknown to known users and their activity history has also been incredible for attributing conversion points. We were able to identify what our most substantial assets were and restructure our marketing efforts and budget to ensure that we were targeting our audience the way they wanted.

What do you dislike about Resulticks?
With a solution like Resulticks, use cases have to be planned before onboarding a tool. It can be hard to know where to start as the platform has to offer, so pre-planning is crucial to ensure Resulticks' capabilities are fully utilized.

Recommendations to others considering Resulticks:
I would highly recommend Resulticks if you are looking for a user-friendly, all-in-one marketing platform.

What problems is Resulticks solving and how is that benefiting you?
We mainly solved two problems: the need for straightforward campaign reporting across all channels and taking our personalization capabilities to the next level. Resulticks has been a gamechanger for all of it. We can now view campaign results across all channels on a single dashboard without pulling out disparate reports from different channels. Furthermore, with so many new attributes we can create for each persona, we now have more data points on our customers to develop strategic collateral that will appeal to specific persona groups.

The ability to track unknown to known users and their activity history has also been incredible for attributing conversion points. initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Resulticks?
This software helped our company in the correct automation of marketing, promoting more and more campaigns, focusing on increasing profits in sales and business growth, the tools offered are successfully coupled to the company, achieving a wide range of traffic to our website and attract potential customers.
The tools are working for us improving our CRM and Marketing solutions.

What do you dislike about Resulticks?
The functionality of this platform sometimes became difficult but with its excellent technical service, everything was solved effectively; but over there we have not had any more inconvenience during its use, for that reason the service is being improved to be able to use the service more easily and without problems.

Recommendations to others considering Resulticks:
Our company recommends the use of this platform for medium and small companies that need a platform that manages digital campaigns and is affordable, especially those that are starting. On the other hand, the follow-up of potential customers is also one of the qualities that this software has, allowing you to know what their interests are.
A complete and detailed system that works perfectly that offers automation, I am happy because it has worked and the tools are really useful, I recommend it.

What problems is Resulticks solving and how is that benefiting you?
All our campaigns must be constantly updated and automated, sometimes it becomes tedious but with the support of Resulticks this process is easier; Through campaign tracking, drip campaigns, segmentation and push notifications, the administration of the main marketing activities has been simple and interactive.

all_reviews.review_content:

Resulticks is an affordable digital marketing automation platform that helps to increase revenue through real-time conversations and social media marketing. Easily integrated with Facebook, Linked In, Twitter, Instagram, and Pinterest Social media tools to track real time business, Resulticks makes it easier for companies to engage their customers online. Spend less time doing monotonous digital marketing chores and start getting more done. Social media marketing platform helps brands automate social media, save time, increase conversions, and measure results.

We recommend Resulticks for multiple online businesses to increase sales. It offers a marketing calendar where we can plan our social media posts, link your Google Analytics data to better plan our content strategy and campaign management, and track how many people are engaging with our content on platforms.

It includes a powerful digital marketing calendar that allows us to connect multiple tools in one place, giving ultimate control over our business's digital presence. By executing personalized marketing strategies across all our social media channels, Resulticks helps to generate more business leads and convert them into customers. all_reviews.review_title: Robust solution for true omnichannel marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Resulticks?
Resulticks is an incredibly intuitive solution that requires very little support from their team. My team was able to set up campaigns or analyze results very quickly and effortlessly. The multidimensional campaign canvas is very convenient and includes all the conventional B2B channels that we need. The ability to track unknown to known users and their activity history has also been incredible for attributing conversion points. We were able to identify what our most substantial assets were and restructure our marketing efforts and budget to ensure that we were targeting our audience the way they wanted.

What do you dislike about Resulticks?
With a solution like Resulticks, use cases have to be planned before onboarding a tool. It can be hard to know where to start as the platform has to offer, so pre-planning is crucial to ensure Resulticks' capabilities are fully utilized.

Recommendations to others considering Resulticks:
I would highly recommend Resulticks if you are looking for a user-friendly, all-in-one marketing platform.

What problems is Resulticks solving and how is that benefiting you?
We mainly solved two problems: the need for straightforward campaign reporting across all channels and taking our personalization capabilities to the next level. Resulticks has been a gamechanger for all of it. We can now view campaign results across all channels on a single dashboard without pulling out disparate reports from different channels. Furthermore, with so many new attributes we can create for each persona, we now have more data points on our customers to develop strategic collateral that will appeal to specific persona groups.

Resulticks is an omnichannel marketing automation platform that supports all digital marketing requirements. It has a range of tools and plethora features like marketing automation, marketing calendar, push notifications, socialmedia marketing, segmentation etc.

It is very complex for the business but you will get used to it in little time. It has no API but its interface is nice and it is very less buggy compared to others.

We mainly use it for creating marketing campaigns and market to targeted audience.
